Principium of Astrology: When Mona crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.
\"Come 'n' Get Me, Hag!\": After she has used Illusory Torrent for 2s, if there are any opponents nearby, Mona will automatically create a Phantom. A Phantom created in this manner lasts for 2s, and its explosion DMG is equal to 50% of Mirror Reflection of Doom.
Waterborne Destiny: Increases Mona's Hydro DMG Bonus by a degree equivalent to 20% of her Energy Recharge rate.
